# K√∂m…ôk√ßi kitabxana

[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](LICENSE) [![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/pyhelper-tools-jbhm?style=for-the-badge&label=PyPI&color=blue)](https://pypi.org/project/pyhelper-tools-jbhm/)

## üåç M√∂vcud dill…ôr

Pyhelper ** 131 dil √º√ß√ºn ** √º√ß√ºn ** 131 dild…ô qurulmu≈ü t…ôrc√ºm…ôl…ôri t…ôklif edir:

------


## üöÄ qura≈üdƒ±rma

Pypi-d…ôn qura≈üdƒ±rƒ±n:

```bash
pip install pyhelper-tools-jbhm
```

------

## üìñ Baxƒ±≈ü

** Pyhelper ** , ** m…ôlumatlarƒ±n t…ôhlili, vizualla≈üdƒ±rma, statistik …ôm…ôliyyatlar v…ô kommunal i≈ü axƒ±nlarƒ±nƒ± asanla≈üdƒ±rmaq √º√ß√ºn hazƒ±rlanmƒ±≈ü √ßox y√∂nl√º bir Python al…ôt d…ôstidir.  
Bu, faylƒ±, t…ôdqiqat v…ô pe≈ü…ô layih…ôl…ôrin…ô, qazanc kodundan daha √ßox fikirl…ôr…ô diqq…ôt yetirm…ôy…ô imkan ver…ôn elmi, t…ôdqiqat v…ô pe≈ü…ô layih…ôl…ôrin…ô birl…ô≈üir.

∆èsas √ºst√ºnl√ºkl…ôr:
- üßÆ Qura≈üdƒ±rƒ±lmƒ±≈ü ** statistika v…ô riyaziyyat kommunallarƒ± ** 
- üìä ƒ∞stifad…ôsi asandƒ±r ** M…ôlumat Vizualla≈üdƒ±rma S…ôlisi ** 
- üóÇ Handy ** Fayl i≈ül…ônm…ôsi v…ô axtarƒ±≈ü ** 
- üîç ** Sintaksis Doƒürulama ** √º√ß√ºn Python fayllarƒ± √º√ß√ºn
- üåç ** Hazƒ±r t…ôrc√ºm…ôl…ôrl…ô ** ** √ßox dilli d…ôst…ôk ** 
- üöÄ Fast Prototiping ** v…ô ** T…ôhsil ** √º√ß√ºn optimaldƒ±r

------

## ‚ú® ∆èsas x√ºsusiyy…ôtl…ôr

### üìä M…ôlumat vizualla≈üdƒ±rma
- Bar qrafikl…ôri: √ºf√ºqi v…ô ≈üaquli (`hbar`, `vbar`)  
- Daƒüƒ±tƒ±m sah…ôl…ôri: histoqramlar (`histo`), qutu sah…ôl…ôri (`boxplot`), KDE s√ºjetl…ôri (`kdeplot`)  
- M√ºqayis…ôli sah…ôl…ôr: skripka, ocaq, zolaq sah…ôl…ôri  
- Korrelyasiya t…ôhlili: HeatMaps (`heatmap`), s…ôp…ôl…ônm…ô sah…ôl…ôri (`scatter`)  
- ∆ètraflƒ± vizualizasiya: c√ºt sah…ôl…ôr, birg…ô sah…ôl…ôr, reqressiya sah…ôl…ôri  
- M…ôlumat masalarƒ±: bi√ßimlendirilmi≈ü masa displeyl…ôri (`table`)  

### üìà Statistik analiz
- ** M…ôrk…ôzi Tendensiya ** : Orta (`get_media`), median (`get_median`), rejimi (`get_moda`)  
- ** Dispersiya ** : Range (`get_rank`), d…ôyi≈üm…ô (`get_var`), standart sapma (`get_desv`)  
- ** T…ôhlil ** : Dispersiya hesabatlarƒ± (`disp`), IQR hesablamalarƒ±, normalla≈üdƒ±rma, ≈ü…ôrti d…ôyi≈üiklikl…ôr  
- ** Xarici a≈ükarlama ** : IQR v…ô Z-Score metodlarƒ±  

### üóÇÔ∏è Fayl idar…ô√ßiliyi
- `call()` (auto-detect CSV, JSON, XML, etc.) il…ô aƒüƒ±llƒ± k…ô≈üf  
- √áox formatlƒ± d…ôst…ôk (CSV, JSON, XML, PDF, spatial data)  
- `DataBase` sinif il…ô SQL veril…ônl…ôr bazasƒ± idar…ôetm…ô  
- D√∂n√º≈ü√ºm kommunallarƒ± (`convert_file`)  

### üõ†Ô∏è Developer al…ôtl…ôri
- Sistemi d…ôyi≈üdirin (`Switch`, `AsyncSwitch`)  
- Sintaksis yoxlanƒ±lmasƒ± (`check_syntax`, `PythonFileChecker`)  
- Z…ôngin s…ôhv hesabatƒ± (multi-language)  
- ƒ∞nteqrasiya edilmi≈ü yardƒ±m sistemi (`help`)  

### üåç beyn…ôlmil…ôll…ô≈üm…ô
- 100+ daxili t…ôrc√ºm…ôl…ôr  
- X√ºsusi t…ôrc√ºm…ôl…ôri y√ºkl…ôyin  
- ƒ∞cra Dili d…ôyi≈üdirm…ô (`set_language() `)  
- Automatic English fallback  

---

## Dependencies (handled automatically):

- pandas, numpy (data manipulation)

- matplotlib, seaborn (visualization)

- scikit-learn (statistics)

- sqlalchemy (database)

- geopandas (spatial data)

---

## üîß Usage Examples

### Set language 

**support for up to 131 languages** 
`14_14_ ``


### ∆èsas statistika
```python
import helper as hp

data = [1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 5]

print(hp.get_media(data))   # Mean
print(hp.get_median(data))  # Median
print(hp.get_moda(data))    # Mode
```

### Vizualla≈üdƒ±rma
```python
import helper as hp

df = hp.pd.DataFrame({"values": [5, 3, 7, 2, 9]})
hp.histo(df, "values", bins=5, title="Sample Histogram")
```

### Fayl i≈ül…ônm…ôsi
```python
from helper import call

data = call(name="my_data", type="csv")  # Finds and loads a CSV file automatically
```

### X√ºsusi t…ôrc√ºm…ôl…ôr
```python
from helper import load_user_translations

# Load custom translations from lang.json
load_user_translations("custom/lang.json")
```

### sintaksis t…ôsdiql…ônm…ôsi
```python
from helper import run

run("./path/to/my_script.py")
#Show gui pop up with results
```

------

## üìÇ Layih…ô qurulu≈üu

```
helper/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ core.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ __init__.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lang/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ en.json
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ es.json
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ... (100+ files)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ submodules/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graph.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ statics.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ utils.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ caller.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ checker.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ manager.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pyswitch.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ shared.py
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ DBManager.py
```
